      • isOptimal

        public boolean isOptimal()

      • onSolutionFound

        public void onSolutionFound(int[] solution)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: SolutionFoundListener
        Callback method called when a new solution is found. While a solution will often be a model, it might also be the case that the solution is something else (MUS, group MUS, etc).
        定義:
        onSolutionFound インタフェース内 SolutionFoundListener
        パラメータ:
        solution - a set of Dimacs literals.

      • onSolutionFound

        public void onSolutionFound(IVecInt solution)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: SolutionFoundListener
        Callback method called when a new solution is found. While a solution will often be a model, it might also be the case that the solution is something else (MUS, group MUS, etc).
        定義:
        onSolutionFound インタフェース内 SolutionFoundListener
        パラメータ:
        solution - a set of Dimacs literals.

      • onUnsatTermination

        public void onUnsatTermination()
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: SolutionFoundListener
        Callback method called when the search is finished (either unsat problem or no more solutions found)
        定義:
        onUnsatTermination インタフェース内 SolutionFoundListener
